backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling public contact form submissions and admin‑restricted retrieval, using access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing addition of a CTA button in FeaturesSection and listing related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing styling, components, and behavior.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Assets config ensuring the .well-known directory is included in the deployed frontend canister.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with meta tags, fonts, and root div loading the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain verification file listing the apex and www domains.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling all landing page sections.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section describing Querétaro, trust indicators, and an accompanying image.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Formspree-backed contact form with required fields and styled inputs/buttons.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section combining the ContactForm with business contact details and social links.
Features section listing four service highlights and including a YouTube-linked CTA button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a themed footer with brand info, navigation links, legal links, and a Caffeine attribution link using scroll-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a full-screen hero section with background image, headline, description, and buttons that trigger scrolling to key sections.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Implements a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation buttons, logo, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleConsulta: Provides a booking section that loads and scrolls to an embedded Calendly widget when the user clicks the Book button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context for managing Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactReque: Placeholder hook with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with Querétaro-inspired colors.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Exports a helper that smooth-scrolls to a section by ID while accounting for header offset.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wrapping the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom colors, fonts, breakpoints, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the landing page requirements, architecture notes, and existing features for build planning.
